text.text: How do I access the contracted charges section for a facility?

text: To access the contracted charges section for a facility, you can use the context switcher to access the child company and make the necessary adjustments.

text.text: What is the purpose of contracted charges in facility billing?

text: A facility contract is an agreement with a facility for a dollar amount that the facility will reimburse your company for services, supplies, and procedures. This is different from charge rates. The contracted facility amount is the amount the facility agreed to pay your company while the charge rate is the amount your company charges. Contracted charges override your company's standard charges and will be applied to any claim billed to this facility.

text.text: How can I override standard charges with contracted charges?

text: To override standard charges with contracted charges, you can use the following steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities 2. Click the All facilities tab 3. Scroll down the list and click the facility name 4. On the Contracted charges tab, click Edit 5. Click the calculation method field and select the method you want to view 6. Click Save changes 7. Click the context switcher and administer the contracted charges at the child level

text.text: Where do I navigate to edit or delete contracted charges for a facility?

text: To edit or delete contracted charges for a facility, you can use the following steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities 2. Click the All facilities tab 3. Scroll down the list and click the facility name 4. On the Contracted charges tab, click Edit 5. Click the calculation method field and select the method you want to view 6. Click Save changes

text.text: What are the options available for the calculation method of contracted charges?

text: The calculation method options for contracted charges are: flat amount per HCPCS, % of Medicare fee schedule, or % of charge amount.

text.text: How do I set a flat amount per HCPCS for contracted charges?

text: To set a flat amount per HCPCS for contracted charges, you can use the following steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities 2. Click the All facilities tab 3. Scroll down the list and click the facility name 4. On the Contracted charges tab, click Edit 5. Click the calculation method field and select the method you want to view 6. Click Save changes

text.text: Can you explain the process to set a percentage of the Medicare fee schedule for contracted charges?

text: To set a percentage of the Medicare fee schedule for contracted charges, you can use the following steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities 2. Click the All facilities tab 3. Scroll down the list and click the facility name 4. On the Contracted charges tab, click Edit 5. Click the calculation method field and select the method you want to view 6. Click Save changes

text.text: After making changes to contracted charges, how do I save them?

text: To save changes to contracted charges, you can use the following steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities 2. Click the All facilities tab 3. Scroll down the list and click the facility name 4. On the Contracted charges tab, click Edit 5. Make the modifications 6. Click Save changes.

text.text: Where can I find the contracted mileage section for a facility?

text: To set the contracted mileage for a facility, you can use the following steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities 2. Click the All facilities tab 3. Scroll down the list and click the facility name 4. On the Mileage tab, click the Edit pencil next to the Contracted mileage heading 5. Loaded miles: Enter the number of loaded miles in this field 6. To or from facility: Enter the name of the facility in this field.

text.text: What information is required to set the contracted mileage for a facility?

text: To set the contracted mileage for a facility, you need to know the following information: 1. The number of loaded miles 2. The name of the facility

text.text: How do I input the number of loaded miles for a facility's contracted mileage?

text: To set the contracted mileage for a facility, you can follow these steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click **Facilities**. 2. Click the **All facilities** tab. 3. Scroll down the list and click the facility name. 4. On the **Mileage** tab, click the **Edit pencil** next to the **Contracted mileage** heading. 5. Enter the number of loaded miles in the **Loaded miles** field. 6. Click **Save changes**.

text.text: What should I enter in the "To or from facility" field when setting contracted mileage?

text: To set the contracted mileage for a facility, you can follow these steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click **Facilities**. 2. Click the **All facilities** tab. 3. Scroll down the list and click the facility name. 4. On the **Mileage** tab, click the **Edit pencil** next to the **Contracted mileage** heading. 5. Enter the number of loaded miles in the **Loaded miles** field. 6. Click **Save changes**.

text.text: Can you describe the significance of setting contracted mileage for a facility?

text: A facility contract is an agreement with a facility for a dollar amount that the facility will reimburse your company for services, supplies, and procedures. This is different from charge rates. The contracted facility amount is the amount the facility agreed to pay your company while the charge rate is the amount your company charges.

text.text: How do I ensure that the changes made to contracted mileage are saved?

text: To ensure that the changes made to contracted mileage are saved, you can follow these steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click **Facilities**. 2. Click the **All facilities** tab. 3. Scroll down the list and click the facility name. 4. On the **Mileage** tab, click the **Edit pencil** next to the **Contracted mileage** heading. 5. Enter the number of loaded miles in the **Loaded miles** field. 6. Click **Save changes**.

text.text: Is there a specific format to follow when entering loaded miles for contracted mileage?

text: To enter loaded miles for contracted mileage, you can follow these steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click **Facilities**. 2. Click the **All facilities** tab. 3. Scroll down the list and click the facility name. 4. On the **Mileage** tab, click the **Edit pencil** next to the **Contracted mileage** heading. 5. Enter the number of loaded miles in the **Loaded miles** field. 6. Click **Save changes**.

text.text: What happens if I make a mistake while inputting contracted mileage data?

text: You can edit or delete a contracted charge.

text.text: Where can I find the list of all facilities to set contracted charges and mileage?

text: To find the list of all facilities, you can click **Facilities** on the navigation bar and then click the **All facilities** tab.

text.text: Can I edit contracted charges and mileage for multiple facilities simultaneously?

text: No, you cannot copy contracted charge information from the parent to the child. You need to use the context switcher and administer the contracted charges at the child level.

text.text: Are there any limitations on the calculation methods available for contracted charges?

text: The calculation method for contracted charges can be % of Medicare fee schedule, % of charge amount, or flat amount per HCPCS.

text.text: How often should contracted charges and mileage be reviewed and updated for accuracy?

text: There is no set frequency for reviewing and updating contracted charges and mileage.

text.text: what is Contracted Charges?

text: Contracted charges are an agreement with a facility for a dollar amount that the facility will reimburse your company for services, supplies, and procedures. This is different from charge rates.

text.text: How to add contracted charge amounts?

text: To add contracted charge amounts, you can use the following steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities. 2. Click the All facilities tab. 3. Scroll down the list and click the facility name. 4. On the Contracted charges tab, click Edit. 5. Click the calculation method field and select the method you want to view. 6. Click Save changes.

text.text: How can I To set a the contracted mileage?

text: To set a the contracted mileage for a facility, you can use the following steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities. 2. Click the All facilities tab. 3. Scroll down the list and click the facility name. 4. On the Mileage tab, click the Edit pencil next to the Contracted mileage heading. 5. Loaded miles: Enter the number of loaded miles in this field. 6. To or from facility: Enter the name of the facility in this field (the facility name will appear in a list after you type three characters). 7. Click Save changes.
